# City Council

![City Council Group Photo](https://temeculaca.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1168 "City Council Group Photo")

## Regular Meetings

- 3 p.m.
- The 2nd and 4th Tuesday of every month
- City Council Chambers  
  41000 Main Street  
  Temecula, CA 92590

City Council meetings are televised Live on Spectrum Channel 3, Frontier FiOS TV Channel 3, Live on [Temecula Mobile App](https://temeculaca.gov/app) and streamed live on [Temecula TV](https://temeculaca.gov/tv).  Meetings are rebroadcasted on TV the following Tuesday and usually available the following day on [Youtube](https://youtube.com/cityoftemecula).

[Email All Council Members](mailto:zak.schwank@temeculaca.gov;jessica.alexander@temeculaca.gov;james.stewart@temeculaca.gov;brenden.kalfus@temeculaca.gov;matt.rahn@temeculaca.gov?cc=Council.Assistant%40TemeculaCA.gov)

[Find your Council District](https://temeculaca.gov/CouncilDistrictMap)

## Overview

The City Council is the elected body of City Government. The City Council is a five member, non-partisan board, elected by district from the citizens of Temecula. The Council makes all policy decisions, and adopts laws for the City of Temecula. The City Council meets formally twice each month on the second and fourth Tuesday of the month.

[City Council Protocol Manual](https://temeculaca.gov/DocumentCenter/View/18608)

## Committees, Subcommittees &amp; External Organizations

City Council members are involved in other committees and organizations. Click [here](https://temeculaca.gov/DocumentCenter/View/18558/2025-Council-Committee-Assignments) to view the City Council Committee Assignments. 

## Request a Meeting with a Council Member

To request a meeting with a Council Member, [send us an email](mailto:Council.Assistant@TemeculaCA.gov) with your interest.

Don't know what District you live in? [Find your Council District](https://temeculaca.gov/CouncilDistrictMap)

[![District Map Thumbnail Opens in new window](https://temeculaca.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=15056)View the Council District Map.](https://temeculaca.gov/CouncilDistrictMap)

## Agendas &amp; Action Minutes

Agendas are typically posted by 4 p.m. on the Friday before the meeting. Video links are typically made available the following morning. Action Minutes are posted when approved during a subsequent meeting.

- [View Agendas &amp; Action Minutes &amp; Video](https://temeculaca.gov/129/Agendas-Action-Minutes)
